import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' export default function GameDetails() { let {id,short_screenshots} = useParams() const [game,setGame]=useState() async function GetGameDetails(id){ let data = await axios.get(`https://api.rawg.io/api/games/${id}?key=ebd97901b6ca451482a89a2881456f4f`) setGame(data.data) console.log(data.data) } useEffect(()=>{ GetGameDetails(id) },[]) return ( <> {game? <>
{game.name}

ScreenShots

{short_screenshots.map((screen,index)=>(
))}

released : {game.released}

rating : {game.rating}

Description {game.description_raw}

:
GameDetails {id}
} ) }
